name: 2D Tactics
description:
A very simple game inspired by various tactic games such as: Advance Wars, Fire Emblem and Wargroove. Currently the game is EXTREMELY barebones and only includes features that are required for the game to be functional enough to actually play.

Considering this is my first game, it has various MAJOR flaws in its code structure, scene structure and game design. I'm not sure if i'll continue with this specific version as a result of this!

Huge thanks to Nekso for providing the awesome pixel art, it would look a whole LOT worse if it would've been left to me :3
